description: This training course provides essential tools and resources to develop and design accessible mobile applications. It gives tools, some development techniques and essential resources to produce accessible applications that conform to RAAM (mobile accessibility framework).
prerequisites: Experience in contributing to the functional design of mobile application
Knowledge of the basic use of a smartphone
english_title: EN 301 549 and RAAM: digital accessibility testing for mobile applications
title: EN 301 549 et RAAM : auditer l'accessibilité numérique des applications mobiles
topics: Legislation on accessibility of mobile applications, standard EN 310 549
RAAM, the Luxembourg reference guide on accessibility of mobile applications
People with disabilities, user needs and mobile assistive technologies
Essential resources on accessible mobile development
